data.actual_result: Discord draws in the large notification bar, and hides part of the search box under the notch, as well as draws the Friends button above the notch
data.expected_result: Discord draws things below the notch instead of cramming the top
data.short_description: Discord places objects in Pixel 3 XL notch
data.steps_to_repro: - [Possibly for non-P3XL Devices] In Android Developer settings, enable Tall Notch mode. - Open discord on a tall-notch device - Open server/channel drawer
